results.title: Circadian rhythms in diabetic retinopathy: an overview of pathogenesis and investigational drugs.
results.text_hl: The latter part of the paper sheds light on those investigational drugs (such as @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@, @CHEMICAL_tasimelteon @CHEMICAL_MESH:C478745 @@@tasimelteon@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) which exhibit potential in the treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@DR@@@ by the targeting of circadian @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@rhythm dysfunction@@@.

results.title: A randomized controlled trial of metformin in women with components of metabolic syndrome: intervention feasibility and effects on adiposity and breast density.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intervention resulted in favorable changes in anthropometric measures of @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Adipose_Tissue @DISEASE_MESH:D018205 @@@adiposity@@@ and a borderline decrease in non-dense breast volume in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@metabolic dysregulation@@@.

results.title: Metformin inhibits NF-kappaB p65/RelA-NLRP3 inflammasome-IL-1beta axis, attenuates lipid droplet accumulation, and reprograms CD14/CD16 expression in monocytes exposed to colorectal tumor-conditioned medium.
results.text_hl: Key aspects of this environment can be mimicked by @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-conditioned medium (TCM). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has emerged as a promising candidate to counteract TCM-induced immune and @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@inflammatory dysregulation@@@.

results.title: Multifactorial causation of early onset colorectal cancer
results.text_hl: First, older individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@metabolic dysregulation@@@ are more frequently on maintenance medications, such as @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, beta-blockers, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering drugs, ACE inhibitors, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, etc., compared to younger individuals.

results.title: Metformin and soybean-derived bioactive molecules attenuate the expansion of stem cell-like epithelial subpopulation and confer apoptotic sensitivity in human colon cancer cells.
results.text_hl: In cells under a @DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@ state mimicking @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@metabolic dysregulation@@@ and without and with added @GENE_PTEN @GENE_5728 @@@PTEN@@@-specific inhibitor @CHEMICAL_SF1670 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000619508 @@@SF1670@@@, colonosphere formation and frequency of the @GENE_PROM1 @GENE_8842 @@@CD133@@@(+)@GENE_CD44 @GENE_960 @@@CD44@@@(+) subpopulation were decreased by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, Lun and @CHEMICAL_Genistein @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019833 @@@Gen@@@, alone and when combined.

results.title: Differential effects of 3 classes of antidiabetic drugs on olanzapine-induced glucose dysregulation and insulin resistance in female rats.
results.text_hl: METHODS: We compared the effects of 3 distinct classes of antidiabetic drugs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (100 and 500 mg/kg, oral), @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@ (6 and 30 mg/kg, oral) and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glyburide@@@ (2 and 10 mg/kg, oral), on olanzapineinduced @<m>DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@metabolic dysregulation@@@.
